resources.string: It is an application that is intended to entertain its users. Different animals can be seen in this app. Guess it right; you\'ll hear the sound of it! As easy as it sounds, the extreme level makes it interesting, and it is indeed hard! Want to know what we are talking about? Come and play our app!
John Erwin Albos \n Sean Michael Borje \n Xenia Angelica Velacruz
